TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Halusipun, title = Halusipun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halusipun} }

S.FORM: Halusipun Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantou ko Halusipun a niyaro', 46 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 128 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 40% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 51 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 60% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 77 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 38%, Amis 1%, Cou 2%.

Halosipon Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantoo ko Halosipon a niyaro', 46 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 128 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 40% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 51 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 60% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 77 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 38%, Amis 1%, Coo 2%.
